ai-anya-e0105n13:1_0: Again, Abhaya, they show to that fear of terror and wrapped in the cows. In this way they will show it in exactly the same way.
ai-anya-e0105n13:1_1: Then at that time, the Elder Mahā-Dhātudatta, having heard this composed to the Great Monastery of the Elders. Then, having heard that the King’s composed to the town called Bhaddā Kāpilānī, when he heard that in the Southernaka, was like this, he thought, “From then, when weakened the Dhamma”,
ai-anya-e0105n13:1_2: The Great Elder named Sāla, having dwelt in that southern branch approached the right there,
ai-anya-e0105n13:1_3: Because of that the senior size of the Elders named Sākiyaka
ai-anya-e0105n13:1_4: The great Vāseṭṭhas, after that time in the Great Wood, at the time of the kingdom furnishing (the Buddha’s) bowls, and at the time of the Great Wood, an unwful horns (?).
